title: Graphik is use?
content:
I’m pretty sure this isn’t Futura but is Graphik by Christian Schwartz

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907171218im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/tru1_6669.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907171218im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/tru_5637.png)

[http://www.christianschwartz.com/graphik.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907171218/http:/www.christianschwartz.com/graphik.shtml "http://www.christianschwartz.com/graphik.shtml")

Mikey :-)

If you’ve seen the add for this spackle on Drew Barrymore, you can tell the product does not do what it says it does!
author: SuperUltraFabulous

comments.content: blend reminds me of [Futura Maxi Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907171218/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/atfutura-maxi/atfutura-maxi-light/), but it isn’t light enough and the ascenders are shorter. Both could be easily fixed though.

i’m pretty sure this is nowhere near graphik but a superultraafabulous try at it mate!!

———————————-  
Chopper Reid says “Harden the \*\*\*\* up”.
